class BlockManager

Detailed Description

This class is a Filter. A filter is a specialized Block which consumes data coming from blocks, transforms them and produce data sending it to other blocks.

Build a filter. A filter inherits from Block.

Parameters:
bm a pointer to the block manager.
name a descriptive name of this filter.
bufsz preferred control pin's buffer size.
bufcount preferred control pin's buffers count.
queuesz control pin's internal priority queue size.
